metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4472 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The overflow protection in Expat is removed by compilers with certain optimization settings, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via crafted XML data. NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2015-1283 and CVE-2015-2716.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> fixed in USN-2983-1 in the CVE-2015-1283-refix.patch patch ebarretto> tla uses system expat as of 1.3.5+dfsg-15

criterions.comment: cadaver package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
coin3 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
expat package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-1ubuntu1').
matanza package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
swish-e package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
tla package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.5+dfsg-15').
xmlrpc-c package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
